Question.Subject: Chatango Hidden Smileys?
Question.Content: I've noticed while using chatango that certain smileys can be used that arn't listed on the smiley page. So far, I've seen *burger* and *poop* <---( yeah that one is weird.) I was wondering if there are anymore? Just curious.
Question.ChosenAnswer: *rolleyes* *lol* *burger* *bored* _shhh *waves* *blush* *hb* *h* zzzz *pukes* *stop* Smileys that can only be used if you've donated to the site: *dog* *panda* *monkey* *cat* *$* *soccer* *bball* _hmmm *snow*
